subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds scored 19 points as No. 4 Villanova beat St. John’s, 81-71, on Saturday at Madison Square Garden to match the best start in team history.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds scored 19 points as No. 4 Villanova beat St. John’s, 81-71, on Saturday at Madison Square Garden to match the best start in team history.
